Serialized Form

  • Package Battle

    • Class Battle.Battle extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • tiles

          java.util.Set<E> tiles
          Contains tiles on the screen that contain a letter.

        • answerChars

          java.util.Stack<E> answerChars
          A stack where the top keeps track of which is the next correct letter the user hasn't spelled.

        • answered

          java.util.List<E> answered
          All characters that the user has correctly answered.

        • question

          java.lang.String question
          The question for the current battle.

        • answer

          java.lang.String answer
          The answer for the current battle.

        • running

          boolean running
          Whether the Battle is still running.

        • difficulty

          int difficulty
          The difficulty of the battle.

        • tickCount

          long tickCount
          How many game ticks have elapsed in the battle.

        • timer

          javax.swing.Timer timer
          A timer that repeatedly calls the game tick process.
          See Also:
          Battle.tick

        • tileFont

          java.awt.Font tileFont
          The font to draw the file with

        • tick

          java.awt.event.ActionListener tick
          Main game tick process. Does processing and renders the frame.
          See Also:
          Battle.paintComponent(Graphics)
